title: When one marathon is just not enough... try and complete the six-star challenge
text:
There will be 50,000 runners making their way across the start line of the New York Marathon on Sunday with the sound of Frank Sinatra’s “New York, New York” belting out in the background.

Among their number will be 170 known as the “Six Star Hopefuls”, a group of amateurs about to join a very exclusive club.

The New York marathon is the last marathon major of the year. Yes, running has marathon majors just like tennis and golf.

The difference is that marathon majors are open to all of us, not just the elites, and there is a booming number of runners travelling the world to conquer the six-star challenge, namely to run each of the marathon majors in your lifetime.

The major season starts in February...
description: There will be 50,000 runners making their way across the start line of the New York Marathon on Sunday with the sound of Frank Sinatra’s “New York, New York” belting out in the background.
